setup.permissions.title: Permissions Required
setup.permissions.subtitle: Cap needs permissions to run properly.
setup.permissions.screenRecording.name: Screen Recording Permission
setup.permissions.screenRecording.descri: Add Cap in System Settings, then restart the app for changes to take effect.
setup.permissions.screenRecording.restar: After adding Cap in System Settings, you'll need to restart the app for the permission to take effect.
No, I still need to add it
setup.permissions.accessibility.name: Accessibility Permission
setup.permissions.accessibility.descript: During recording, Cap collects mouse activity locally to generate automatic zoom in segments.
setup.permissions.microphone.name: Microphone Permission
setup.permissions.microphone.description: This permission is required to record audio in your Caps.
setup.permissions.camera.name: Camera Permission
setup.permissions.camera.description: This permission is required to record your camera in your Caps.
setup.mode.title: Select Recording Mode
setup.mode.subtitle: Choose how you want to record with Cap. You can change this later.
update.error.manualDownload: Please download the latest version manually from cap.so/download. Your data will not be lost.
update.error.contactSupport: If this issue persists, please contact support.
update.installed.restartToFinish: Update has been installed. Restart Cap to finish updating.
